name: StiK 1: The PIT
description:
This game is made in WICK EDITOR: https://www.wickeditor.com/#/

This game is about a stick man who tries to cross the huge guttery pit, where thousands of stick men like you tried, fail. If you think there's no solution, try to think out of the box...I'm happy with the result because this one is absolutely javascript.

StiK 1: The Pit by Mr.StiK

(no stickmen were harmed when making this game, I guess...)

Share your experience and let's see how we can improve next time.
